vatRateResults.comment: Clause 1 of Paragraph 1 of Section 41 of the Law.

code.description: Education services
Sporting services and amusement and recreation services

vatRateResults.comment:
The fee set by an association or foundation for participation in sports competitions and for sports lessons. Provided that the purpose of the services provided is not to generate additional income for this association or foundation.
(Clauses 14.1 and 14.2 of Paragraph 1 of Section 52 of the Law; https://likumi.lv/ta/en/en/id/253451)

code.description: Human health services

category.description: Provision of medical and dental care and thermal treatment

vatRateResults.comment:
Certain medical and dental services.
(Clauses 3, 4, 5, and 7 of Paragraph 1 of Section 52 of the Law; https://likumi.lv/ta/en/en/id/253451)

code.description: Residential care services
Social work services without accommodation

category.description: Supply of goods and services by organisations recognised as being devoted to social wellbeing by Member States and engaged in welfare or social security work

vatRateResults.comment:
Social care, vocational and social rehabilitation, social assistance and social work services.
(Clause 9 of Paragraph 1 of Section 52 of the Law; https://likumi.lv/ta/en/en/id/253451)

code.description: Arts creation and performing arts services

category.description: Supply of services by writers, composers and performing artists, or of the royalties due to them

vatRateResults.comment:
The royalty received by the author for his work and use thereof.
(Clause 18 of Paragraph 1 of Section 52 of the Law; https://likumi.lv/ta/en/en/id/253451)

code.description: Libraries, archives, museums and other cultural services

category.description: Admission to shows, theatres, circuses, fairs, amusement parks, concerts, museums, zoos, cinemas, exhibitions and similar cultural events and facilities

vatRateResults.comment:
Cultural services.
(Clause 17 of Paragraph 1 of Section 52 of the Law; https://likumi.lv/ta/en/en/id/253451)

code.description: CHAPTER 49 - PRINTED BOOKS, NEWSPAPERS, PICTURES AND OTHER PRODUCTS OF THE PRINTING INDUSTRY; MANUSCRIPTS, TYPESCRIPTS AND PLANS

vatRateResults.comment:
Magazines and other periodicals in the form of printed publication or electronic publication, website publications and subscription fees, including the supply of the abovementioned periodicals online or by downloading them, if they are published in Latvian, Latgalian, or Livonian, as well as in the official languages of the EU, the EEA, Switzerland, EU candidate countries, and the OECD.
(Paragraphs 7, 8, and 9 of Section 42 of the Law; https://likumi.lv/ta/en/en/id/253451)

code.description: CHAPTER 49 - PRINTED BOOKS, NEWSPAPERS, PICTURES AND OTHER PRODUCTS OF THE PRINTING INDUSTRY; MANUSCRIPTS, TYPESCRIPTS AND PLANS

category.description: Supply, including on loan by libraries, of books, newspapers and periodicals either on physical means of support or supplied electronically or both (including brochures, leaflets and similar printed matter, children's picture, drawing or colouring books, music printed or in manuscript form, maps and hydrographic or similar charts), other than publications wholly or predominantly devoted to advertising and other than publications wholly or predominantly consisting of video content or audible music.

vatRateResults.comment:
Books in the form of printed publication or electronic publication, the supply of the abovementioned literature online or by downloading them, if they are published in Latvian, Latgalian, or Livonian, as well as in the official languages of the EU, the EEA, Switzerland, EU candidate countries, and the OECD.
(Paragraphs 5, 8, and 9 of Section 42 of the Law; https://likumi.lv/ta/en/en/id/253451)

code.description: CHAPTER 49 - PRINTED BOOKS, NEWSPAPERS, PICTURES AND OTHER PRODUCTS OF THE PRINTING INDUSTRY; MANUSCRIPTS, TYPESCRIPTS AND PLANS

vatRateResults.comment:
Newspapers in the form of printed publication or electronic publication, website publications and subscription fees, including the supply of the abovementioned periodicals online or by downloading them, if they are published in Latvian, Latgalian, or Livonian, as well as in the official languages of the EU, the EEA, Switzerland, EU candidate countries, and the OECD.
(Paragraphs 7, 8, and 9 of Section 42 of the Law; https://likumi.lv/ta/en/en/id/253451)

Specialised food products intended for infants.

Medical products.

code.description: Diagnostic or laboratory reagents on a backing, prepared diagnostic or laboratory reagents whether or not on a backing, other than those of headingÂ 3002 or 3006; certified reference materials
Carriages for disabled persons, whether or not motorised or otherwise mechanically propelled
Of carriages for disabled persons
Renal dialysis equipment (artificial kidneys, kidney machines and dialysers)
Other

Orthopaedic appliances, including crutches, surgical belts and trusses; splints and other fracture appliances; artificial parts of the body; hearing aids and other appliances which are worn or carried, or implanted in the body, to compensate for a defect or disability
Ozone therapy, oxygen therapy, aerosol therapy, artificial respiration or other therapeutic respiration apparatus

category.description: Medical equipment, aids and other appliances normally intended to alleviate or treat disability, for the exclusive personal use of the disabled, including the repair of such goods

code.description: Fuel wood, in logs, in billets, in twigs, in faggots or in similar forms; wood in chips or particles; sawdust and wood waste and scrap, whether or not agglomerated in logs, briquettes, pellets or similar forms

Supplies of firewood, if the actual consumer thereof is an inhabitant who purchases and consumes firewood for domestic needs. 
(Paragraph 11 of Section 42 of the Law; https://likumi.lv/ta/en/en/id/253451)

code.description: Steam and hot water supply services through mains

Supplies of thermal energy, if the actual consumer thereof is an inhabitant who purchases and consumes thermal energy for domestic needs. 
(Paragraph 12 of Section 42 of the Law; https://likumi.lv/ta/en/en/id/253451)
